item.title: Microsoft removes guide for installing Windows 11 on unsupported PCs - but this hack still works - ZDNet
item.description:
1. Microsoft removes guide for installing Windows 11 on unsupported PCs - but this hack still works  ZDNet
  2. Microsoft Warns 400 Million Users—Do Not Update Windows  Forbes
  3. Microsoft quietly erases Windows 11 TPM 2.0 bypass workaround from help page  The Register
  4. Microsoft silently erases tip for installing Windows 11 on older PCs  PCWorld
  5. Microsoft is cracking down on people upgrading to Windows 11 on unsupported hardware  XDA Developers
